name: Affixing of cigarette tax stamps to export cigarettes or altered packages prohibited
text: §245-56  Affixing of cigarette tax stamps to export cigarettes or altered packages prohibited.  A person shall be guilty of a class B felony if the person knowingly affixes any cigarette tax stamp required under this chapter to the package of any cigarettes described in section 245-51 or altered in violation of section 245-52. [L 2000, c 201, pt of §1; am L 2001, c 32, §2]
